arts.ttl: I saw Man City man show hidden leadership quality and prove Pep Guardiola's point in ten minutes
arts.sum: These are the moments you might have missed as Manchester City beat Sparta Prague in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: 'We need him' - Pep Guardiola hails emerging star after Man City injury update
arts.sum: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola spoke about Matheus Nunes on a night when the Portugal international shone

arts.ttl: Man City break Man Utd's 15-year-old Champions League record
arts.sum: But the heavy nature of City's demolition of Sparta was enough to lift Pep Guardiola's side into third place thanks to a superior goal difference than the six other teams who also have seven points. Manchester City ensured on Wednesday night that the top three in the Champions League standings all belong to the Premier League, putting five goals past Sparta Prague.

arts.ttl: Man City eye Gyokeres move - Thursday's gossip
arts.sum: Manchester City could move for Sporting Lisbon's Viktor Gyokeres, Xavi wants to take Raphinha from Barcelona if he becomes Manchester United boss, plus more.

arts.ttl: Man City break 15-year Man United record in Champions League win over Sparta Prague
arts.sum: Manchester City have etched their name in Champions League history following their commanding victory over Sparta Prague on Wednesday night.

arts.ttl: How Savinho was 'crucial' to City's improved second-half performance
arts.sum: Match of the Day pundit Steph Houghton analyses how Savinho "grew into the game" to become a key part of Manchester City's 5-0 win over Sparta Prague on match week three in the UEFA Champions League.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola applauds ‘unbelievable’ Erling Haaland’s stunning acrobatic goal
arts.sum: Haaland put City 2-0 up just prior to the hour mark at the Etihad Stadium with a remarkable effort.

arts.ttl: Erling Haaland steals show with stunning backheel but Man City teammate has last laugh
arts.sum: MAN CITY 5-0 SPARTA PRAGUE: Pep Guardiola's side ran riot over their Czech opponents in the Champions League with star man Erling Haaland producing a goal right out of the top drawer

arts.ttl: 'I don't care' - Pep Guardiola sets out Erling Haaland priority after Man City stunner
arts.sum: Manchester City striker Erling Haaland scored a wonderful goal as his scoring streak continues this season

arts.ttl: Government adds parachute payments to Football Governance Bill as Man United and Man City watch on
arts.athr: newsdesk@men-news.co.uk (Jamie Gardner PA Chief Sports Reporter, Jack Flintham)
arts.sum: The EFL's chairman Rick Parry has long criticised the distorting impact the payments from the Premier League have on the Championship in particular.
